issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

components.name: storm-core
components.description: Core storm daemons and APIs including trident

fields.description:
When using the new Pacemaker (which, you kind of have to, cos the alternative of not using it is abusing ZK to the point of deadlocking it...), you cannot submit topologies because _submitTopology_ is calling ClusterState's _delete_node_blobstore_ which never got implemented in _pacemaker_state_factory.clj_.

Here's a nice stack trace:
{noformat}
2015-12-05 07:07:21 b.s.d.nimbus [WARN] Topology submission exception. (topology name='cron-ba161de') #error {
 :cause org.apache.storm.pacemaker.pacemaker_state_factory$_mkState$reify__3956.delete_node_blobstore(Ljava/lang/String;Ljava/lang/String;)V
 :via
 [{:type java.lang.AbstractMethodError
   :message org.apache.storm.pacemaker.pacemaker_state_factory$_mkState$reify__3956.delete_node_blobstore(Ljava/lang/String;Ljava/lang/String;)V
   :at [sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl invoke0 NativeMethodAccessorImpl.java -2]}]

  [sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl invoke0 NativeMethodAccessorImpl.java -2]
  [sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl invoke NativeMethodAccessorImpl.java 62]
  [sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl invoke DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.java 43]
  [java.lang.reflect.Method invoke Method.java 497]
  [clojure.lang.Reflector invokeMatchingMethod Reflector.java 93]
  [clojure.lang.Reflector invokeInstanceMethod Reflector.java 28]
  [backtype.storm.daemon.nimbus$setup_storm_code invoke nimbus.clj 467]
  [backtype.storm.daemon.nimbus$fn__7774$exec_fn__2579__auto__$reify__7803 submitTopologyWithOpts nimbus.clj 1523]
  [backtype.storm.generated.Nimbus$Processor$submitTopologyWithOpts getResult Nimbus.java 2940]
  [backtype.storm.generated.Nimbus$Processor$submitTopologyWithOpts getResult Nimbus.java 2924]
  [org.apache.thrift7.ProcessFunction process ProcessFunction.java 39]
  [org.apache.thrift7.TBaseProcessor process TBaseProcessor.java 39]
  [backtype.storm.security.auth.SimpleTransportPlugin$SimpleWrapProcessor process SimpleTransportPlugin.java 158]
  [org.apache.thrift7.server.AbstractNonblockingServer$FrameBuffer invoke AbstractNonblockingServer.java 518]
  [org.apache.thrift7.server.Invocation run Invocation.java 18]
  [java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor runWorker ThreadPoolExecutor.java 1142]
  [java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker run ThreadPoolExecutor.java 617]
  [java.lang.Thread run Thread.java 745]]}
2015-12-05 07:07:21 o.a.t.s.AbstractNonblockingServer$FrameBuffer [ERROR] Unexpected throwable while invoking!
java.lang.AbstractMethodError: org.apache.storm.pacemaker.pacemaker_state_factory$_mkState$reify__3956.delete_node_blobstore(Ljava/lang/String;Ljava/lang/String;)V
  at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke0(Native Method)
  at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(NativeMethodAccessorImpl.java:62)
  at sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.java:43)
  at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Method.java:497)
  at clojure.lang.Reflector.invokeMatchingMethod(Reflector.java:93)

comments.body:
GitHub user iostat opened a pull request:

    https://github.com/apache/storm/pull/926

    [STORM-1375] Blobstore broke Pacemaker

    When using the new Pacemaker (which, you kind of have to, cos the alternative of not using it is abusing ZK to the point of deadlocking it...), you cannot submit topologies because submitTopology is calling ClusterState's delete_node_blobstore which never got implemented in pacemaker_state_factory.clj.
    
    This PR introduces a noop implementation of default-node-blobstore for pacemaker.

You can merge this pull request into a Git repository by running:

    $ git pull https://github.com/socialrank/storm pacemaker-blobstore

Alternatively you can review and apply these changes as the patch at:

    https://github.com/apache/storm/pull/926.patch

To close this pull request, make a commit to your master/trunk branch
with (at least) the following in the commit message:

    This closes #926
    
----
commit d14dabdafc9c7c9f5f1b97eae522a0373fe38669
Author: Ilya Ostrovskiy <ilya@socialrank.com>
Date:   2015-12-05T15:29:36Z

    default noop implementation for delete-node-blobstore for pacemaker_state_factory

commit 2246b72224b418343958f95762ebfdc75c9ab044
Author: Ilya Ostrovskiy <ilya@socialrank.com>
Date:   2015-12-05T15:32:58Z

    move delete-node-blobstore lower so its not implied it passes through to
    zk-state

----

Github user redsanket commented on the pull request:

    https://github.com/apache/storm/pull/926#issuecomment-162259989
  
    +1 NB

Github user HeartSaVioR commented on the pull request:

    https://github.com/apache/storm/pull/926#issuecomment-162475213
  
    +1 
    @iostat Could you rebase? 3 commits changes only 1 line.

Github user iostat commented on the pull request:

    https://github.com/apache/storm/pull/926#issuecomment-162525572
  
    ugh, seems like github wants to hold on to the previous 3 commits, so now I have 5 commits :(. Worth just reopening this PR, or do any of you know a trick for this?

Github user schonfeld commented on the pull request:

    https://github.com/apache/storm/pull/926#issuecomment-162526706
  
    I suppose you could just reset the branch to master, copy/paste the change, and force push to this branch
    
    > On Dec 7, 2015, at 08:32, Ilya Ostrovskiy <notifications@github.com> wrote:
    > 
    > ugh, seems like github wants to hold on to the previous 3 commits, so now I have 5 commits :(. Worth just reopening this PR, or do any of you know a trick for this?
    > 
    > â€”
    > Reply to this email directly or view it on GitHub.
    >

Github user iostat commented on the pull request:

    https://github.com/apache/storm/pull/926#issuecomment-162527130
  
    alright there we go.

Github user HeartSaVioR commented on the pull request:

    https://github.com/apache/storm/pull/926#issuecomment-162529152
  
    Thanks for the update. +1 again.

Github user asfgit closed the pull request at:

    https://github.com/apache/storm/pull/926

Github user iostat commented on the pull request:

    https://github.com/apache/storm/pull/926#issuecomment-162530017
  
    Cool. Thanks for the merge!
